Package org.apache.commons.configuration.resolver

A package containing EntityResolvers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EntityRegistry Interface used for registering and retrieving PUBLICID to URL mappings.
EntityResolverSupport Interface that identifies the class as using an EntityResolver
 

Class Summary
CatalogResolver Thin wrapper around xml commons CatalogResolver to allow list of catalogs to be provided.
CatalogResolver.Catalog Overrides the Catalog implementation to use the underlying FileSystem.
CatalogResolver.CatalogManager Extend the CatalogManager to make the FileSystem and base directory accessible.
DefaultEntityResolver The DefaultEntityResolver used by XML Configurations.
 

Package org.apache.commons.configuration.resolver Description

A package containing EntityResolvers.
